title: First Dance With You
features: Mysterious.Hot.Dangerous?One dance with a masked stranger. One night of pure bliss.College just got a whole lot more exciting…First Dance With You is a a sweet, romantic new adult short story by New York Times & USA Today Bestselling Author Clarissa Wild.
